name: uk_la_evi
title: UK Local Authorities with Electric Vehicle Infrastructure information
description: A dataset that includes current local authorities with information on electric vehicle infrastructure

licenses.name: CC-BY-4.0 except fields NEVIS-distribution, NEVIS-distribution-rank, households-without-driveway, households-without-driveway-pct
licenses.title: Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License except fields NEVIS-distribution, NEVIS-distribution-rank, households-without-driveway, households-without-driveway-pct

contributors.title: mySociety
contributors.role: author of template data, to which changes were made

resources.title: UK Local Authorities (past/current)
resources.description: Table of information about local authorities, and mapping between different ID schemes. Includes current and some past authorities.
resources.name: uk_local_authorities_current

fields.name: local-authority-code
fields.description: Fixed ID for council, not linked to boundary changes. Based on old local authorities register.

fields.name: official-name
fields.description: Official long name for council (may not *always* be legal name)

fields.name: nice-name
fields.description: A shorter name for the council.

fields.name: gss-code
fields.description: The code for the statistical geography of the boundaries of the authority

fields.name: start-date
fields.description: The date the authority came into existance (YYYY-MM-DD). Can be blank.

fields.name: end-date
fields.description: The date the authority was abolished (YYYY-MM-DD). Can be blank.

fields.name: replaced-by
fields.description: If the council was abolished a comma seperated list of successor bodies. Comma seperated when there are multiple (rare - when a county council area is divided into two unitaries).

fields.name: region
fields.description: English region, but using the nation for non-English authorities.

fields.name: local-authority-type
fields.description: The short-code for type of local authority.

fields.name: local-authority-type-name
fields.description: The name of the type of local authority.

fields.name: county-la
fields.description: If this council overlaps with a county council, the local-authority-code of this council. Can be none.

fields.name: combined-authority
fields.description: If the council overlaps with a combined authority, the local-authority-code of this council. Can be done.

fields.name: alt-names
fields.description: Comma seperated list of alternative names for a local authority.
fields.example: Aberdeen City,aberdeen c ity,aberdeen city,aberdeen city council,aberdeen cuty,aberdeen,city of aberdeen

fields.name: notes
fields.description: Any notes on columns or values that require special interpretation.
fields.example: iso code and internal code may differ

fields.name: current-authority
fields.description: a boolean saying if the authority is currently a legal authority (not a past or future authority)

fields.name: gov-uk-slug
fields.description: A url slug for an authority used by gov.uk, or made up for use by EVinfrastructure.co.uk

fields.name: area
fields.description: The area of the boundaries of a local authority, in km squared.

fields.name: pop-2020
fields.description: The estimated number of people living in the local authority in 2020.

fields.name: x
fields.description: X coordinate for the center of the local authority.

fields.name: y
fields.description: Y coordinate for the center of the local authority.

fields.name: lat
fields.description: Latitude of the center of the local authority

fields.name: long
fields.description: Longitude of the center of the local authority

fields.name: powers
fields.description: A grouping of local authority type based on the actual powers of an area (merges several effective 'unitary' categories)

fields.name: lower-or-unitary
fields.description: Boolean stating if the council is a district (lower tier) or unitary council

fields.name: current-administration
fields.description: Political party of current administration

fields.name: administration-since
fields.description: Year that this party has been in office since

fields.name: households-without-driveway
fields.description: Number of households without driveway

fields.name: households-without-driveway-pct
fields.description: Percentage of households without driveway

fields.name: NEVIS-distribution
fields.description: NEVIS near-home charging distribution

fields.name: NEVIS-distribution-rank
fields.description: NEVIS near-home charging distribution rank among lower-tier authorities in England

fields.name: EVI-link
fields.description: URL of local authority webpage on electric vehicle infrastructure

fields.name: EVI-email
fields.description: Email address for enquiries related to electric vehicle infrastructure

fields.name: EVI-portfolio-holder
fields.description: Councillor responsible for the portfolio which includes electric vehicle infrastructure

fields.name: LEVI-capital-amount
fields.description: LEVI capital funding amount (£) for England, or EVIF funding in Scotland, or ULEVTF in Wales

fields.name: LEVI-tender-stage
fields.description: Status of LEVI/EVIF/ULEVTF tender(s)

fields.name: LEVI-tender-link
fields.description: URL of any LEVI/EVIF/ULEVTF tender

fields.name: LEVI-tender-open-date
fields.description: Date of release of LEVI/EVIF/ULEVTF tender (YYYY-MM-DD)

fields.name: LEVI-tender-close-date
fields.description: If known, date of release of LEVI/EVIF/ULEVTF tender (YYYY-MM-DD)

fields.name: LEVI-CPO(s)
fields.description: Tenderers appointed to spend LEVI/EVIF/ULEVTF funds

fields.name: channel-status
fields.description: Local authority's position on cross-pavement channels

fields.name: channel-grant-amount
fields.description: Pavement Channel Grant funding amount (£)

fields.name: channel-application-fee
fields.description: Pavement channel application fee (£)

fields.name: channel-installation-fee
fields.description: Pavement channel regular installation fee (£)

fields.name: channel-annual-fee
fields.description: Annual licence fee or equivalent for pavement channels

fields.name: channel-manufacturer
fields.description: Manufacturer of cross-pavement channel

fields.name: ORCS-total-amount
fields.description: Total ORCS funding (£)

fields.name: ORCS-total-charging-devices
fields.description: Total ORCS charging devices

fields.name: channel-link
fields.description: URL of information on cross-pavement channels

fields.name: combined-authority-2
fields.description: Local authority code of a second combined authority of some type other than LEVI proper partnerships, such as ORCS, LEVI pilot, or Pavement Channel Grant.

fields.name: combined-authority-3
fields.description: Local authority code of a third combined authority of some type other than LEVI proper partnerships, such as ORCS, LEVI pilot, or Pavement Channel Grant.

fields.name: combined-authority-type
fields.description: The type (such as ORCS, LEVI pilot, or Pavement Channel Grant) of second or third combined authorities of type other than LEVI proper partnerships.

fields.name: LEVI-pilot-capital-amount
fields.description: The total funding which a body received as part of the LEVI pilot (2022-2023)

fields.name: LEVI-pilot-CPO(s)
fields.description: Tenderers appointed to spend the LEVI pilot funds

fields.name: ORCS-CPO(s)
fields.description: Tenderers appointed to spend ORCS funds

fields.name: channel-grant-status
fields.description: The status of an authority's application for the Pavement Channel Grant, such as applied or declined to apply. For those highway authorities who are not managing a pavement channel grant, this will show that the grant is assigned to a combined authority
